text: Chares () is the name of three prominent ancient Greeks: *Chares of Athens - a 4th-century BC general; *Chares of Mytilene - a historian who lived at the court of Alexander the Great; *Chares of Lindos - a sculptor who created the Colossus of Rhodes A chare may also be: *Chare - a dialect term in north-east England for an alleyway ==See also== *Charls
title: Chares
